Header.title: Simplify Accident Reporting with
Header.description: Costa is your bridge between you and your insurance company. Forget paperwork—report accidents directly from the app in just a few steps.

features.title: Accident Reporting Made Easy
features.description: With Costa, you can quickly report accidents, scan documents, capture damages, and send reports directly to your insurance company.

feature1.title: QR Code Scanning
feature1.description: Scan the other driver’s Costa QR code. If unavailable, scan their license, grey card, or insurance papers.

feature2.title: Damage Capture
feature2.description: Use our guided scan model to take clear pictures of the damages on your vehicle.

feature3.title: Accident Description
feature3.description: Describe how the accident happened using OCR and draw a simple sketch of the scene.

feature4.title: Instant Submission
feature4.description: Send your complete accident report directly to your insurance company without paperwork.

footer.description: Costa is an innovative platform that eliminates paperwork by enabling quick, simple, and secure accident reporting. Just scan, describe, and submit—all from your mobile app.
footer.description2: With Costa, insurance companies and drivers stay connected in real time, ensuring smoother processes, reduced fraud, and faster claim handling.

service.title: Smart Accident Reporting
service.description: Costa helps drivers report accidents faster while keeping insurance companies connected in real time.

service1.title: Scan & Report
service1.description: Easily scan documents or a Costa QR code to share driver and vehicle details.

service2.title: Guided Damage Scan
service2.description: Take accurate photos of damages with AI-guided instructions for clear evidence.

service3.title: Insurance Bridge
service3.description: Submit accident details instantly to your insurance provider without paperwork.

steps.title: How it Works?
steps.step1: Open the Costa app and start a new accident report.
steps.step2: Scan the other driver’s Costa QR code or upload license, grey card, and insurance details.
steps.step3: Take guided photos of the vehicle damages.
steps.step4: Describe the accident using text or OCR and draw a sketch of the scene.
steps.step5: Review and confirm your accident report.
steps.step6: Submit it directly to your insurance company for processing.
